system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant. You know all about JSF XHTML files and HTML. You know how to create a draw.io text file, and you know all about UML class diagrams.

user_prompts.prompt: I'm going to give you the contents of a JSF XHTML file. Include all interactable components as part of form controls. This includes dropdowns, text inputs, buttons, checkboxes, scroll bars, labels, etc.
Refer to the format file contents I sent you at the very beginning. Follow the same format when generating the document.
